DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether stimulating physical activity during the first year of life influences growth and body composition, and stimulates motor activity and motor development
DOC.brief_title: Early Obesity Intervention Program Within GECKO Drenthe; a Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: date of birth (December 2006February 2008) area of living (around Meppel and Hoogeveen in the province of Drenthe, one of the Northern provinces of the Netherlands) Children under care of child physiotherapists will be excluded from the program
